title: Super Rare early SO35 RHD interior for sale SOLD!!!

posts.content:
Not your everyday interior!

This super rare interior is the same as the more known SO34 interior with the big difference that this has the lovely wood finish, it's also early and a RHD one which makes it even more rare!

I would say it's 85% complete with all the major parts there, it's in a decent condition but will need a fair bit of TLC, the wardrobe will need some work tho!

As you'll notice this has been stored for a while and some parts will clean up nicely as there's a huge amount of dust on it which is the reason why i'm putting this up for sale is that's all it does at the moment.. eating dust i was planning on modifying it to fit my highroof but plans have changed. Im asking Â£1800, not cheap i know but fair considering it's rarity!


Included is

big wardrobe
kitchenette
fridge/bar (complete with all trays)
3 seats
front facing panel under bed/seat with door latch and hinges in the right color!
flip/jumpseat which sits between the cabinets in the back ( no bottom frame)
Flipseat



I'd rather not split this interior as i would like to see this going as one.. however if there's enough interest in different parts and i'm not left with bits n pieces i might consider to split..

Cheers Stephan

PM sent, also if RHD the side seat would be on the other side if that makes sense

James

Not sure what you mean but i hope this pic will clear it out for you..



Difference is the wardrobe which is accessible on the front in a LHD and on the long side in a RHD..

But you can easily use this is a LHD as well, that was my intention anyway.

my rhd has the cargo doors on the lefthand side so possibly lhd one? i don't know for sure!

james

Hi James, the brochure shows a pic of a lhd, now picture the cargodoors on the other side (RHD) and the seats on the opposite side, you wouldn't be able to open the door easily and that's why ( i guess) they moved the acces of the wardrobe..

Are you with me?

Or maybe i don't get your question..

YES I'm with you

cheers

James
NOW SOLD!!!
